countries.name: Country, Australia

countries.name: Country, Japan
countries.description: A bustling metropolis blending tradition and modernity, famous for its cherry blossoms and rich culture.

temples.name: Angkor Wat temple, Cambodia
temples.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site and the largest religious monument in the world.

temples.name: Taj Mahal greatest temple, India
temples.description: An iconic symbol of love and a masterpiece of Mughal architecture.

beaches.name: Bora Bora Beach, French Polynesia
beaches.description: An beach known for its stunning turquoise waters and luxurious overwater bungalows.

beaches.name: Copacabana Beach, Brazil
beaches.description: A famous beach in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, with a vibrant atmosphere and scenic views.
